title: Fulcrum Wind 42 and 57 wheels are made for road and all-road riding
content:
The updated wheels in 42 and 57 mm rim depths save 100 grams over their predecessors while adding all-road capability.

Read the full article at Fulcrum Wind 42 and 57 wheels are made for road and all-road riding on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
